meanings.definition: The study of the movement of electrically charged particles.
meanings.sent1: Electrokinetics helps us understand how charged particles move.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use electrokinetics to study the behavior of electrically charged particles.
meanings.sent3: Learning about electrokinetics can be quite enlightening.
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, electrokinetics is like a dance of charged particles.
meanings.sent5: The concept of electrokinetics sparkles with fascination.

meanings.definition: The branch of physics that deals with the interaction between electric fields and moving charges.
meanings.sent1: Understanding electrokinetics involves exploring electric fields and moving charges.
meanings.sent2: Electrokinetics plays a crucial role in studying the relationship between electric fields and moving charges.
meanings.sent3: The mysteries of electrokinetics can be quite shocking.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of physics, electrokinetics paints a picture of electric fields in motion.
meanings.sent5: The world of electrokinetics is electrifying and dynamic.
